numlitem.para: Alternate procedures are established and used,
Boeing Service Bulletin 747-31-2410 or production equivalent is incorporated, and
Repairs are made within two flight days.

note.para: Service Bulletin 747-31-2410 has been incorporated on all UPS aircraft.
The following EICAS messages may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Visual approaches are not authorized with GPWS inoperative. Instrument approach procedures must be used.

note.para: For operations to Americas' Region ONLY, the flight may not depart outbound domestic gateways with an inoperative Ground Proximity Warning system, but may continue series of flights for repair interval specified in the Repair Int Category section.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: “GPWS SYS INOP”. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
